aGrayedOut: They are either implemented yet, or your server does not support them yet.
aHowConfigureLayout: Mini layouts can get cramped, I know! But, please advise on how they can be improved, instead of replacing them.
If you must, then future updates will include options to force larger layouts.
aOneMoreThing: You can switch from the mini layout to "Quick Post" anytime, by pressing the button on the left.
aPageIntro: This page lets you compose posts.
In the future, you will also be able to create polls and track your published content.
aSuchLayoutsMuchWow: Dhaaga has three unique composer layouts! Phew!
The smallest one appears when replying to direct messages and posts. Quick and easy!
The medium sized one (a.k.a. - "Quick Post") appears when publishing original posts. It has most options, but a bit cramped for longer posts.
The full sized composer (not implemented yet) will have every option to express your creativity!
composer.label: Guide (Composer)
composer.qGrayedOut: Why are some options grayed out?

aNoRecommendations: If it is neither in the navigation bar dropdown, nor appears in the Explore tab with recommendations on, it is not implemented yet.
Ping me sometime and I'll look into it ;)
aPageIntro: This is your discovery hub and exploration diary for the internet.
Go find topics that excite you and find awesome communities you find a sense of belonging with :)
aStuckCannotReset: The Dhaaga project cares about the digital wellbeing of it's users. Recommendations are off by default.
Tools have been designed to help you organically discover content and communities you care about.
You can enable recommendations using the quick settings below.
discover.label: Guide (Discover)

aExplainProfiles: You can have multiple profiles for every account.
A nice way to decorate the hub pins by interest.
aHowToDeletePins: Long press any pin to show more options!
aOneMoreThing: You can freely switch between accounts here,
But, it does not change which account is active everywhere else in the app.
If you try to open a pin for an inactive account, a dialog box will help you switch and continue.
aPageIntro: The "Social Hub" is a powerful profile management and hub customization experience unique to Dhaaga.
Easily organise and keep track of your interests.
No need to trawl through algorithmic feeds!
hub.label: User Guide (Hub)

aOneMoreThing: 1) All the buttons in Dhaaga are bottom aligned for easy one-handed use.
2) Swiping between tabs was disabled to make it easy to swipe media carousels (and motion sickness, obviously).
aPageIntro: In Dhaaga, your notifications are split into four tabs. This feature is also called "Inbox Categories".
Each tab presents the information in a format more suited for that category.
aTabChat: The "Chat" tab shows all conversations you are a participant in.
p.s. - Only Bluesky has dedicated chat features. Fediverse implementation will vary between software.
aTabMention: The "Mentions" tab shows replies/quotes to your posts. It also shows posts where you are mentioned.
aTabSocial: The "Social" tab shows people who liked/shared your posts, as well as follower/following changes.
aTabUpdates: The "Updates" interface shows posts from users you are subscribed to.
p.s. - Subscribing to account updates is not implemented by Bluesky yet. So, the tab will be empty.
aWhyFewSettings: Additional settings and features are still being worked on.
inbox.label: Guide (Inbox)
inbox.qTabChat: What does the chat tab show?
inbox.qTabMention: What does the mentions tab show?
inbox.qTabSocial: What does the social tab show?
inbox.qTabUpdates: What does the updates tab show?

aHowEditAccountDetails: You would have to use your SNS websites for that.
Dhaaga supports tens of platforms. Implementing infrequently accessed features will slow down development and increase maintenance efforts.
aHowManageAccount: New accounts can be onboarded from the account management page. Access it from the navbar of your home interface.
Also, long pressing the profile tab (5th) brings up the account switcher :)
aPageIntro: Consider this your account overview page.
You can access most of your server's features, as well as Dhaaga special features from here.
aProfileOutOfSync: Just pull down and refresh your account overview (home) page. Dhaaga is designed to be a highly network efficient and offline first client.
This applies to most account information (i.e. - counters, avatar, banner etc). Also applies to some other server side settings (e.g.- NSFW, filters etc.).
myAccount.label: Guide (Home)
myAccount.qHowEditAccountDetails: Can I edit my account details?
myAccount.qProfileOutOfSync: My information is out of sync

aServerSettingMismatch: Dhaaga is a multi-protocol client supporting many SNS software.
So, these settings have to be set-up locally.
But, once done, they will then be applied to all your SNS accounts!
aSupportHow: As an indie developer, I'd really appreciate your feedback, encouragement and support.

Feel free to drop by and say hello ðŸ‘‹: 
Hated it ? Tell me what I can improve!
Liked it ? maybe share it with your friends!
Loved it ? consider leaving a tip!
aWhereAmI: From here, you can tweak various settings that affect your experience throughout the app and extra goodie features offered by Dhaaga.
settings.label: Guide (Settings)
settings.qServerSettingMismatch: Why are my server settings not imported?
settings.qSupportHow: For real though, How can I support you ?
